abstract.p: American Advertising Federation names Arthur Liebler and David A Park to head organization for 2000-2001; Worldwide Partners, international network of independent advertising agencies, names Jonathan Bond as chairman and Steve O'Leary as vice chairman, each for one-year term (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: * The American Advertising Federation, Washington, named two executives to head the organization for 2000-2001. They are Arthur Liebler, senior vice president for global brand marketing at DaimlerChrysler, Auburn Hills, Mich., and David A. Park, chief executive of the DDB Group, Los Angeles, part of the DDB Worldwide unit of the Omnicom Group.

* Worldwide Partners, an international network of independent agencies, named Jonathan Bond as chairman and Steve O'Leary as vice chairman, each for a one-year term. Mr. Bond is a co-chairman at Kirshenbaum Bond & Partners, New York and Mr. O'Leary is president at the T&O Group, Irvine, Calif.
